item.text: SME definition [http://ec.europa.eu/enterprise/policies/sme/files/sme_definition/sme_user_guide_en.pdfUser guide and model declaration]
SME definition [http://ec.europa.eu/enterprise/policies/sme/files/sme_definition/sme_user_guide_en.pdfUser guide and model declaration]
SME definition [http://ec.europa.eu/enterprise/policies/sme/files/sme_definition/sme_user_guide_en.pdfUser guide and model declaration]
From my point of view Viral Academy LLP does qualify as an SME.
From my point of view Viral Academy LLP does qualify as an SME.
From my point of view Viral Academy LLP does qualify as an SME.

• Engages in economic activities
  • Employ less than 250 people
  • Have an annual turnover not exceeding EUR 50 million
  • Have an annual balance sheet total not exceeding EUR 43 million

• Engages in economic activities
  • Employ less than 250 people
  • Have an annual turnover not exceeding EUR 50 million
  • Have an annual balance sheet total not exceeding EUR 43 million

• Engages in economic activities
  • Employ less than 250 people
  • Have an annual turnover not exceeding EUR 50 million
  • Have an annual balance sheet total not exceeding EUR 43 million

• Engages in economic activities
  • Employ less than 250 people
  • Have an annual turnover not exceeding EUR 50 million
  • Have an annual balance sheet total not exceeding EUR 43 million

• Engages in economic activities
  • Employ less than 250 people
  • Have an annual turnover not exceeding EUR 50 million
  • Have an annual balance sheet total not exceeding EUR 43 million
From my point of view Viral Academy LLP does qualify as an SME. We yet don't, but as an LLP can engage in economic activities.

After putting all the company details and contact person etails you have to establish whether your company is an [[SME]] and to fill in the form to declare your company as an SME. It opens in the same form which opens when you register an organisation.

story.text: SME definition [http://ec.europa.eu/enterprise/policies/sme/files/sme_definition/sme_user_guide_en.pdfUser guide and model declaration]

• Engages in economic activities

  • Have an annual turnover not exceeding EUR 50 million
  • Have an annual balance sheet total not exceeding EUR 43 million
From my point of view Viral Academy LLP does qualify as an SME. We yet don't, but as an LLP can engage in economic activities.

After putting all the company details and contact person etails you have to establish whether your company is an [[SME]] and to fill in the form to declare your company as an SME. It opens in the same form which opens when you register an organisation.
